sentences.english: Objective To investigate the technique of phacoemulsification with hard nucleolus cataract.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨硬核白内障超声乳化的手术技巧。

sentences.english: Thats ok then cos i watch hard core.
Fanzui Xiangfa is a hardcore-punk band from Beijing, China.
sentences.chinese: “犯罪想法”，硬核朋克乐队，来自北京。

sentences.english: The liquid permeates the hard core of the tare root.
sentences.chinese: 液体渗透到莠草根部的硬核。

sentences.english: We are just a hardcore band.
sentences.chinese: 我们就是一个硬核乐队。

sentences.english: I don't know why but for me I feel that the hardcore life is growing in me everyday.
sentences.chinese: 我倒觉得自己的硬核生命每一天都在成长。

definition: (neologism) (of movies, songs etc) affecting/touching/moving/(of a person, esp. a woman) charming/cool
player (of a game)/enthusiast (audio, model planes etc)
two-dimensional/the fictional worlds of anime, comics and games
to play fast and loose with the law/to game the system/(leisure) rules of the game/way of doing an activity/(tourism) way of experiencing a place
minority of the population/non-mainstream (activity, pursuit etc)/niche (market etc)
